segments.text: If I tell you . , you must be completely taken aback .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on . Tell me what happened .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He married a girl who is only eighteen !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that true ? But anyhow , it's none of our business , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2
